name: Stop Waiting For Godot
description:
Made in three hours for the Stop Waiting For Godot Jam, a very barebones 3D game where you get to fight the impressive foe that is Godot 4.0... Or is he?  

The theme was "Keep it simple" and let's say I succeeded at that.  All code and art my own and unique for this jam. I'm pretty experienced with Godot's 2D functionality and from this experience I can see a lot of that translated pretty well to 3D... 

If you're looking for the source code for the game, I'll gladly give it to anyone who asks in the comments.
